We are proud to promote purpose, diversity, inclusion, learning and work-life integration – we’re a great place to work and we are continually striving to be the best place to work!Your MissionDevelop design, technical specifications, schematics, equipment selection, and other data to evaluate the feasibility of designs or applications.Your Role – Magic happens when you bring great people together!The individual will have a diversified portfolio of technical functions consistent with the requirements of the solution including good knowledge on product selection for Uniflair and 3rd party suppliers of Prefab solutions. CFDs performance capability and airflow background in very tigh spaces are required.Tendering phaseoParticipates in the opportunity with the team leader (accountable), internal and external customer or customer’s representative to understand and document the owner’s project requirements during the influence stage.oUnderstands the standards and local codes of the opportunity.oProvides appropriate cooling system design documents to support the proposal and allow the tendering team team to complete the overall solution, design and cost.oProvides the specifications for the design and compliance and deviation list from vendors.oRequests, reviews, and approves sub-consultant proposals to provide a complete set of design documents for the opportunity.oProvides the technical narrative to be incorporated into the proposal.oSupports the bid risk assessment.Construction PhaseoPrepares all cooling systems engineering documentation for projects engineers and subcontractors within the scheduled delivery time.oDesigns cooling topologies, cooling schemes, cooling load, cooling configuration and airflow validation & CFDs as required.oValidates cooling complex solutions such as Autodesk CFD, Flowvent, or others.oProvides support and response to the factories for integration.oValidates internal/external factories and subcontractors designoParticipates in recurring construction meetings as required.·Supports the execution team.·Engineering support function, supporting requests from other engineering teams, factory, commisiong, sub-contractors, services, site support.·Provides/validates as-builts drawings at the end of the project from redlines provided by the executionAbout YouEducation: Bachelor’s degree in EngineeringLanguage requirements:             Fluent in English 
French language will be valuable Experience:   ·Minimum of 5 years in the design, application engineering.·Minimum of 3 years on cooling design for Data Centers is desirable.·Capability to work in a Multi Discipline Engineering team.·Microsoft tools, REVIT, CAD and any CFD software that might be usable to validate cooling complex solutions such as Autodesk CFD, Flowvent, or others.Skills requirements ·Communication skills.·Professional user of MS office.·Ability to work with team.Job Details
